content:
During the conduct of special actions in the Avdeevsky direction of the sniper of the 3rd separate regiment of the SCO of the Armed Forces of Ukraine revealed the location of the supervisory point of the enemy.

About thisinformsCommand of Special Operations forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

“Having confirmed the existence of Russian servicemen on the observer, the information was transmitted by a unit of unmanned aviation complexes. After that, the strike UAV worked on the target, ”the message reads.

The department also noted that as a result, the joint actions of snipers and UAV operators destroyed a fortified observation post and two enemy soldiers.

As reported by the Armyinform, Baba Yaga at nightflew to enemy positionsin Kharkiv and eliminated 4 invaders.
title: Special Forces have undermined the observation post and two occupiers
description: About it reports the Command of Special Operations of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. “Confirmed ...
author: Army Inform
